# Card Component - Comprehensive Guide

## Overview

The Card component is a versatile container component that provides structured content organization with multiple variants, sizes, and customization options. It follows industry standards with semantic HTML structure and comprehensive accessibility features.

## Features

### ✅ Core Features
- **Multiple variants** (default, minimal, elevated, bordered, filled, outlined, ghost, card, panel)
- **Multiple sizes** (xs, sm, md, lg, xl, 2xl, full)
- **Color themes** (primary, success, warning, danger, info, neutral)
- **Background colors** (primary, success, warning, danger, info, neutral, brand-orange, brand-navy, none)
- **Text colors** (primary, secondary, success, warning, danger, info, neutral, brand-orange, brand-navy, white, black, auto)
- **Semantic HTML structure** with proper ARIA attributes
- **Keyboard navigation** support
- **Responsive design** with full-width options
- **Overflow control** for dropdowns and popovers

### ✅ Advanced Features
- **Industry standard sub-components** (Card.Header, Card.Body, Card.Footer, Card.Title, Card.Description, Card.Actions, Card.Content)
- **Loading states** with skeleton animation
- **Image support** with multiple positions (top, bottom, left, right)
- **Gradient backgrounds** (primary-to-secondary, success-to-info, warning-to-danger, brand-orange-to-brand-navy, rainbow, custom)
- **Animations** (fadeIn, slideUp, slideDown, slideLeft, slideRight, scale)
- **Card Groups** for layout management
- **Polymorphic components** with `as` prop
- **Backward compatibility** with existing usage patterns

## Installation & Import

```tsx
import { Card } from '@acutrack-bookprint/acutrack-ds';
```

## Basic Usage

### Simple Card
```tsx
<Card>
  <p>This is a simple card with default styling.</p>
</Card>
```

### Card with Header and Body
```tsx
<Card>
  <Card.Header>
    <Card.Title>Card Title</Card.Title>
    <Card.Description>Card description goes here</Card.Description>
  </Card.Header>
  <Card.Body>
    <p>Card content goes here</p>
  </Card.Body>
</Card>
```

### Complete Card Structure
```tsx
<Card variant="elevated" size="lg" color="primary">
  <Card.Header>
    <Card.Title>Project Dashboard</Card.Title>
    <Card.Description>Overview of your current projects</Card.Description>
  </Card.Header>
  <Card.Body>
    <div className="space-y-4">
      <div className="flex justify-between">
        <span>Active Projects</span>
        <span className="font-semibold">12</span>
      </div>
      <div className="flex justify-between">
        <span>Completed</span>
        <span className="font-semibold">8</span>
      </div>
    </div>
  </Card.Body>
  <Card.Footer>
    <Card.Actions>
      <Button variant="primary">View All</Button>
      <Button variant="outline">Export</Button>
    </Card.Actions>
  </Card.Footer>
</Card>
```

## Props Reference

### Card Props

| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| `variant` | `CardVariant` | `'default'` | Visual style variant |
| `size` | `CardSize` | `'md'` | Size of the card |
| `color` | `CardColor` | `'neutral'` | Border and accent color |
| `backgroundColor` | `CardBackgroundColor` | `'none'` | Background color |
| `textColor` | `CardTextColor` | `'auto'` | Text color |
| `fullWidth` | `boolean` | `false` | Take full width of container |
| `isRounded` | `boolean` | `true` | Apply rounded corners |
| `hasShadow` | `boolean` | `true` | Apply shadow effect |
| `isDisabled` | `boolean` | `false` | Disabled state |
| `overflowVisible` | `boolean` | `false` | Allow content to overflow |
| `loading` | `boolean` | `false` | Show loading skeleton |
| `imageSrc` | `string` | - | Image source URL |
| `imageAlt` | `string` | - | Image alt text |
| `imagePosition` | `'top' \| 'bottom' \| 'left' \| 'right'` | `'top'` | Image position |
| `imageSize` | `CardSize` | `'md'` | Image size |
| `gradient` | `CardGradient` | `'none'` | Gradient background |
| `gradientColors` | `string[]` | - | Custom gradient colors |
| `animation` | `CardAnimation` | `'none'` | Animation type |
| `animationDelay` | `number` | `0` | Animation delay in ms |
| `animationDuration` | `number` | `300` | Animation duration in ms |
| `className` | `string` | - | Additional CSS classes |
| `style` | `React.CSSProperties` | - | Inline styles |
| `ariaLabel` | `string` | - | ARIA label |
| `ariaDescribedBy` | `string` | - | ARIA described by |
| `role` | `string` | - | ARIA role |
| `as` | `keyof React.JSX.IntrinsicElements` | `'div'` | HTML element type |

### Card Sub-Component Props

#### Card.Header
| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| `className` | `string` | - | Additional CSS classes |
| `style` | `React.CSSProperties` | - | Inline styles |

#### Card.Body
| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| `className` | `string` | - | Additional CSS classes |
| `style` | `React.CSSProperties` | - | Inline styles |

#### Card.Footer
| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| `className` | `string` | - | Additional CSS classes |
| `style` | `React.CSSProperties` | - | Inline styles |

#### Card.Title
| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| `as` | `'h1' \| 'h2' \| 'h3' \| 'h4' \| 'h5' \| 'h6'` | `'h3'` | Heading level |
| `className` | `string` | - | Additional CSS classes |
| `style` | `React.CSSProperties` | - | Inline styles |

#### Card.Description
| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| `className` | `string` | - | Additional CSS classes |
| `style` | `React.CSSProperties` | - | Inline styles |

#### Card.Actions
| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| `className` | `string` | - | Additional CSS classes |
| `style` | `React.CSSProperties` | - | Inline styles |

#### Card.Content
| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| `className` | `string` | - | Additional CSS classes |
| `style` | `React.CSSProperties` | - | Inline styles |

#### Card.Image
| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| `src` | `string` | - | Image source URL |
| `alt` | `string` | - | Image alt text |
| `size` | `CardSize` | `'md'` | Image size |
| `isAspectRatioMaintained` | `boolean` | `true` | Maintain aspect ratio |
| `isRounded` | `boolean` | `true` | Apply rounded corners |
| `className` | `string` | - | Additional CSS classes |

#### Card.Group
| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| `direction` | `CardGroupDirection` | `'horizontal'` | Layout direction |
| `gap` | `'xs' \| 'sm' \| 'md' \| 'lg' \| 'xl'` | `'md'` | Gap between cards |
| `columns` | `number` | `3` | Number of columns for grid |
| `className` | `string` | - | Additional CSS classes |

## Variants

### Default
```tsx
<Card variant="default">
  <p>Subtle shadow, no border</p>
</Card>
```

### Minimal
```tsx
<Card variant="minimal">
  <p>Transparent background, no border or shadow</p>
</Card>
```

### Elevated
```tsx
<Card variant="elevated">
  <p>Prominent shadow for depth</p>
</Card>
```

### Bordered
```tsx
<Card variant="bordered">
  <p>Clear border definition</p>
</Card>
```

### Filled
```tsx
<Card variant="filled">
  <p>Background color fill</p>
</Card>
```

### Outlined
```tsx
<Card variant="outlined">
  <p>Transparent background with border</p>
</Card>
```

### Ghost
```tsx
<Card variant="ghost">
  <p>Hover effects with transparent background</p>
</Card>
```

### Card
```tsx
<Card variant="card">
  <p>Standard card with shadow and border</p>
</Card>
```

### Panel
```tsx
<Card variant="panel">
  <p>Panel-style with background and border</p>
</Card>
```

### Extra Small
```tsx
<Card size="xs">

</Card>

  <p>Extra large card</p>
</Card>
```

### 2X Large
```tsx

  <p>Very large card for prominent content</p>
</Card>
```

### Full
```tsx
<Card size="full">
  <p>Full size card</p>
</Card>
```

## Advanced Features

### Loading State
```tsx
<Card loading={true}>
  <p>This content will be replaced with skeleton loader</p>
</Card>
```

### Image Support
```tsx
<Card 
  imageSrc="/path/to/image.jpg"
  imageAlt="Card image"
  imagePosition="top"
  imageSize="lg"
>
  <Card.Header>
    <Card.Title>Card with Image</Card.Title>
  </Card.Header>
  <Card.Body>
    <p>Content below the image</p>
  </Card.Body>
</Card>
```

### Gradient Backgrounds
```tsx
<Card gradient="primary-to-secondary">
  <p>Card with gradient background</p>
</Card>

<Card 
  gradient="custom"
  gradientColors={['#ff6b6b', '#4ecdc4', '#45b7d1']}
>
  <p>Card with custom gradient</p>
</Card>
```

### Animations
```tsx
<Card 
  animation="fadeIn"
  animationDelay={100}
  animationDuration={500}
>
  <p>Animated card</p>
</Card>
```

### Card Groups
```tsx
<Card.Group direction="horizontal" gap="lg">
  <Card size="sm">
    <p>Card 1</p>
  </Card>
  <Card size="sm">
    <p>Card 2</p>
  </Card>
  <Card size="sm">
    <p>Card 3</p>
  </Card>
</Card.Group>

<Card.Group direction="grid" columns={2} gap="md">
  <Card>
    <p>Grid Card 1</p>
  </Card>
  <Card>
    <p>Grid Card 2</p>
  </Card>
</Card.Group>
```

## Accessibility

### ARIA Attributes
```tsx
<Card 
  ariaLabel="Project dashboard card"
  ariaDescribedBy="project-description"
  role="region"
>
  <Card.Header>
    <Card.Title>Project Dashboard</Card.Title>
  </Card.Header>
  <Card.Body>
    <p id="project-description">Overview of current projects</p>
  </Card.Body>
</Card>
```

### Keyboard Navigation
- Cards are focusable by default
- Use `Tab` to navigate between cards
- Use `Enter` or `Space` to activate interactive cards

## Responsive Design

### Full Width
```tsx
<Card fullWidth={true}>
  <p>This card takes full width of its container</p>
</Card>
```

### Responsive Sizing
```tsx
<Card 
  size="md"
  className="w-full md:w-1/2 lg:w-1/3"
>
  <p>Responsive card sizing</p>
</Card>
```

## Overflow Control

### Dropdown Support
```tsx
<Card overflowVisible={true}>
  <Select 
    options={countryOptions}
    placeholder="Select Country"
  />
</Card>
```

### MultiSelect Support
```tsx
<Card overflowVisible={true}>
  <MultiSelect 
    options={skillOptions}
    placeholder="Select Skills"
  />
</Card>
```

## Backward Compatibility

### Old Usage (Still Supported)
```tsx
<Card>
  <div>
    <h3>Title</h3>
    <p>Content</p>
    <button>Action</button>
  </div>
</Card>
```

### New Usage (Recommended)
```tsx
<Card>
  <Card.Header>
    <Card.Title>Title</Card.Title>
  </Card.Header>
  <Card.Body>
    <p>Content</p>
  </Card.Body>
  <Card.Footer>
    <Card.Actions>
      <button>Action</button>
    </Card.Actions>
  </Card.Footer>
</Card>
```

## Best Practices

### 1. Use Semantic Structure
```tsx
// ✅ Good
<Card>
  <Card.Header>
    <Card.Title>User Profile</Card.Title>
    <Card.Description>Manage your account settings</Card.Description>
  </Card.Header>
  <Card.Body>
    <form>...</form>
  </Card.Body>
  <Card.Footer>
    <Card.Actions>
      <Button>Save</Button>
      <Button variant="outline">Cancel</Button>
    </Card.Actions>
  </Card.Footer>
</Card>

// ❌ Avoid
<Card>
  <div>
    <h3>User Profile</h3>
    <p>Manage your account settings</p>
    <form>...</form>
    <div>
      <button>Save</button>
      <button>Cancel</button>
    </div>
  </div>
</Card>
```

### 2. Choose Appropriate Variants
```tsx
// ✅ Good - Use elevated for important content
<Card variant="elevated">
  <Card.Title>Important Notice</Card.Title>
</Card>

// ✅ Good - Use minimal for subtle content
<Card variant="minimal">
  <p>Additional information</p>
</Card>
```

### 3. Handle Overflow Properly
```tsx
// ✅ Good - Enable overflow for dropdowns
<Card overflowVisible={true}>
  <MultiSelect options={options} />
</Card>

// ✅ Good - Default overflow for regular content
<Card>
  <p>Regular content that doesn't overflow</p>
</Card>
```

### 4. Use Loading States
```tsx
// ✅ Good - Show loading state
<Card loading={isLoading}>
  <Card.Title>Loading Content</Card.Title>
</Card>
```

### 5. Provide Proper Accessibility
```tsx
// ✅ Good - Include ARIA attributes
<Card 
  ariaLabel="User dashboard"
  role="region"
>
  <Card.Title>Dashboard</Card.Title>
</Card>
```

## Troubleshooting

### Common Issues

#### 1. Dropdowns Being Clipped
**Problem**: Dropdowns in cards are being cut off
**Solution**: Use `overflowVisible={true}` on the card
```tsx
<Card overflowVisible={true}>
  <Select options={options} />
</Card>
```

#### 2. Cards Not Taking Full Width
**Problem**: Cards not expanding to container width
**Solution**: Use `fullWidth={true}` prop
```tsx
<Card fullWidth={true}>
  <p>Full width content</p>
</Card>
```

#### 3. Images Not Displaying
**Problem**: Card images not showing
**Solution**: Check image path and alt text
```tsx
<Card 
  imageSrc="/correct/path/to/image.jpg"
  imageAlt="Descriptive alt text"
>
  <p>Content</p>
</Card>
```

#### 4. Animations Not Working
**Problem**: Card animations not playing
**Solution**: Ensure Tailwind config includes animation classes
```javascript
// tailwind.config.js
module.exports = {
  theme: {
    extend: {
      animation: {
        'fade-in': 'fadeIn 0.3s ease-in-out',
        'slide-up': 'slideUp 0.3s ease-out',
        // ... other animations
      }
    }
  }
}
```

#### 5. Gradient Backgrounds Not Showing
**Problem**: Custom gradients not displaying
**Solution**: Use proper gradient syntax
```tsx
<Card 
  gradient="custom"
  gradientColors={['#ff6b6b', '#4ecdc4']}
>
  <p>Custom gradient card</p>
</Card>
```

## Migration Guide

### From v1.0.67 to v1.0.68

#### New Features Added
- Industry standard sub-components (`Card.Header`, `Card.Body`, `Card.Footer`, etc.)
- Background color support (`backgroundColor` prop)
- Text color control (`textColor` prop)
- Loading states (`loading` prop)
- Image support (`imageSrc`, `imagePosition`, etc.)
- Gradient backgrounds (`gradient` prop)
- Animations (`animation` prop)
- Card Groups (`Card.Group`)

#### Breaking Changes
- None - all changes are backward compatible

#### Recommended Updates
1. **Use new sub-components** for better structure:
```tsx
// Old
<Card>
  <h3>Title</h3>
  <p>Content</p>
</Card>

// New (recommended)
<Card>
  <Card.Header>
    <Card.Title>Title</Card.Title>
  </Card.Header>
  <Card.Body>
    <p>Content</p>
  </Card.Body>
</Card>
```

2. **Add overflow support** for dropdowns:
```tsx
<Card overflowVisible={true}>
  <MultiSelect options={options} />
</Card>
```

3. **Use loading states** for better UX:
```tsx
<Card loading={isLoading}>
  <Card.Title>Content</Card.Title>
</Card>
```

## Examples

### Dashboard Card
```tsx
<Card variant="elevated" size="lg" color="primary">
  <Card.Header>
    <Card.Title>Project Statistics</Card.Title>
    <Card.Description>Overview of your current projects</Card.Description>
  </Card.Header>
  <Card.Body>
    <div className="grid grid-cols-2 gap-4">
      <div className="text-center">
        <div className="text-2xl font-bold text-brand-orange">12</div>
        <div className="text-sm text-text-secondary">Active</div>
      </div>
      <div className="text-center">
        <div className="text-2xl font-bold text-system-success">8</div>
        <div className="text-sm text-text-secondary">Completed</div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </Card.Body>
  <Card.Footer>
    <Card.Actions>
      <Button variant="primary">View Details</Button>
      <Button variant="outline">Export Report</Button>
    </Card.Actions>
  </Card.Footer>
</Card>
```

### User Profile Card
```tsx
<Card 
  variant="bordered" 
  size="lg"
  imageSrc="/user-avatar.jpg"
  imagePosition="left"
  imageSize="md"
>
  <Card.Header>
    <Card.Title>John Doe</Card.Title>
    <Card.Description>Senior Developer</Card.Description>
  </Card.Header>
  <Card.Body>
    <div className="space-y-2">
      <div className="flex items-center gap-2">
        <Icon>email</Icon>
        <span>john.doe@example.com</span>
      </div>
      <div className="flex items-center gap-2">
        <Icon>phone</Icon>
        <span>+1 (555) 123-4567</span>
      </div>
    </div>
  </Card.Body>
  <Card.Footer>
    <Card.Actions>
      <Button variant="primary">Edit Profile</Button>
      <Button variant="outline">Message</Button>
    </Card.Actions>
  </Card.Footer>
</Card>
```

### Feature Card with Animation
```tsx
<Card 
  variant="featured"
  gradient="brand-orange-to-brand-navy"
  animation="slideUp"
  animationDelay={200}
>
  <Card.Header>
    <Card.Title className="text-white">Premium Feature</Card.Title>
    <Card.Description className="text-white/80">
      Unlock advanced capabilities
    </Card.Description>
  </Card.Header>
  <Card.Body>
    <ul className="space-y-2 text-white/90">
      <li>✓ Advanced analytics</li>
      <li>✓ Priority support</li>
      <li>✓ Custom integrations</li>
    </ul>
  </Card.Body>
  <Card.Footer>
    <Card.Actions>
      <Button variant="primary" className="bg-white text-brand-orange">
        Upgrade Now
      </Button>
    </Card.Actions>
  </Card.Footer>
</Card>
```

### Loading Card
```tsx
<Card loading={true} size="lg">
  <Card.Title>Loading Content</Card.Title>
  <Card.Description>Please wait...</Card.Description>
</Card>
```

### Card Group Layout
```tsx
<Card.Group direction="grid" columns={3} gap="lg">
  <Card variant="minimal" size="sm">
    <Card.Title>Quick Stats</Card.Title>
    <Card.Body>
      <div className="text-2xl font-bold">42</div>
      <div className="text-sm text-text-secondary">Items</div>
    </Card.Body>
  </Card>
  
  <Card variant="minimal" size="sm">
    <Card.Title>Recent Activity</Card.Title>
    <Card.Body>
      <div className="text-2xl font-bold">7</div>
      <div className="text-sm text-text-secondary">Updates</div>
    </Card.Body>
  </Card>
  
  <Card variant="minimal" size="sm">
    <Card.Title>Notifications</Card.Title>
    <Card.Body>
      <div className="text-2xl font-bold">3</div>
      <div className="text-sm text-text-secondary">Unread</div>
    </Card.Body>
  </Card>
</Card.Group>
```

## Type Definitions

```typescript
export type CardVariant = 
  | 'default' 
  | 'minimal' 
  | 'elevated' 
  | 'bordered' 
  | 'filled' 
  | 'outlined' 
  | 'ghost' 
  | 'card' 
  | 'panel';

export type CardSize = 
  | 'xs' 
  | 'sm' 
  | 'md' 
  | 'lg' 
  | 'xl' 
  | '2xl' 
  | 'full';

export type CardColor = 
  | 'primary' 
  | 'success' 
  | 'warning' 
  | 'danger' 
  | 'info' 
  | 'neutral';

export type CardBackgroundColor = 
  | 'primary' 
  | 'success' 
  | 'warning' 
  | 'danger' 
  | 'info' 
  | 'neutral' 
  | 'brand-orange' 
  | 'brand-navy' 
  | 'none';

export type CardTextColor = 
  | 'primary' 
  | 'secondary' 
  | 'success' 
  | 'warning' 
  | 'danger' 
  | 'info' 
  | 'neutral' 
  | 'brand-orange' 
  | 'brand-navy' 
  | 'white' 
  | 'black' 
  | 'auto';

export type CardGradient = 
  | 'primary-to-secondary' 
  | 'success-to-info' 
  | 'warning-to-danger' 
  | 'brand-orange-to-brand-navy' 
  | 'rainbow' 
  | 'custom' 
  | 'none';

export type CardAnimation = 
  | 'fadeIn' 
  | 'slideUp' 
  | 'slideDown' 
  | 'slideLeft' 
  | 'slideRight' 
  | 'scale' 
  | 'none';

export type CardGroupDirection = 
  | 'horizontal' 
  | 'vertical' 
  | 'grid';
```

## Version History

- **v1.0.68**: Added industry standard sub-components, background colors, text colors, loading states, image support, gradients, animations, and Card Groups
- **v1.0.67**: Enhanced variants, improved accessibility, added overflow control
- **v1.0.66**: Initial Card component implementation
